channel.title: Is there a mobile wallet for Radix?
channel.description:
No, there is currently not an official mobile wallet for Radix.
## Further explanation Matt explains why there will not be a RDX Works developed mobile wallet for Radix before the Babylon release in the video below:
https://youtu.be/FdrPMseZ9iA?t=1395
